ygData.subject: RE: power level to X?/kiting
ygData.msgSnippet: Since they toned down the disease spells, poison is the best in terms of mana efficency.  And yes you can have multiple DoT s going.  An easy way to see what
ygData.messageBody:
Since they toned down the disease spells, poison is the best in terms of
mana efficency. And yes you can have multiple DoT's going. An easy way
to see what will stack is to cast the spell on yourself. Be careful
though. Its an easy way to die.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Omeg Felligan [SMTP:omeg_felligan@...]
> Sent: Wednesday, July 21, 1999 11:34 AM
> To: EQCheats@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [EQCheats] power level to X?/kiting
>
> From: "Omeg Felligan" <omeg_felligan@...>
>
> ohhh...use a DOT after you SoW yourself...nice. What DOT's are best
> for
> this? (I play a shaman, but probably will start over)
>
> Thanks,
> Omeg
>
> PS..can you stack DOT's so as to have like 3-4 DOTs wearing down at
> the same
> time? (either multiple of the same one, or different ones)
>
